MainMenu:
Type 0 to close the app. 
 Type 1 to start a shift. 
 Type 2 to show a shift by ID. 
 Type 3 to show all shifts. 
 Type 4 to end a shift. 
 Type 5 to update a shift. 
 Type 6 to delete a shift.
